text:
- My company, Profile Software,
specializes in applications
for banking and wealth management.

We're one of the biggest
software houses in Greece.

The clients that we have,
they are conservative.

Because of the nature of
the sector that they are

they have to make small
steps in order to adapt

to the new environment,
but they fully realize

that the technology expands,
that all the big companies,
they are moving to the cloud.
So, we follow them through this trip,
and we try to pave the way in the cloud.
We fully understand that when you go,

when you move your
applications to the cloud

you have much more
technological advantages,
and you can use much more features
in order to please your client.

The client asked us what
cloud he should use.
We give him some options,

but we strongly suggest
to the client to use AWS

because we had the knowledge
that it was more economic.

Of course, and we want
to be more competitive,
but we had the sense that AWS
would be more technologically sufficient.
And we were right.
We chose AWS for two basic reasons.
The first is the economic part
because we want to be really competitive,

and in our field
competition is really hard

so we have to give the
best price to the client.
And when we move our clients to AWS
the solution is always more economic
than moving to another cloud.

And the second dimension
is the technological part.
We really feel safe in AWS.

We believe that it's one of
the safest clouds in the world.

And you have thousands of
engineers that work every day

to provide up-to-date
technological features

that you cannot easily
find in your own company,

so you can find them
easily in the cloud of AWS.
(upbeat instrumental music)
